alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 10:10AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 1100 AM PST... At 1009 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Presa, or near Chula Vista, moving east. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas of heavy rainfall will obscure visibility and generate flooding. Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, Coronado, Downtown San Diego, Lemon Grove, Encanto, Rancho San Diego, La Presa, Paradise Hills, East Village, Lincoln Park, Logan Heights, Spring Valley, Bonita, Mountain View, South Park, Broadway Heights, Mt Hope, and Jamacha Lomita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
